text: La volonté de paix was a French magazine, which was the organ of the International Committee of Action and Propaganda for Peace and Disarmament. It was established in June 1927 by Madeleine Vernet. It ceased publication in January 1936, after being banned when Vernet's husband Louis Tribier was tried for provoking military disobedience. ==References== Category:1927 establishments in France Category:1936 disestablishments in France Category:Defunct political magazines published in France Category:French- language magazines Category:Magazines established in 1927 Category:Magazines disestablished in 1936
title: La volonté de paix
